name: 欧文·艾斯特罗斯
name_full: 欧文·艾斯特罗斯 Owen Asztalos

last_movies.title: 杰西卡·琼斯 第一季

introduction: Owen Asztalos ( born Gyula Owen Asztalos ) was born on July 15, 2005 in Reading, Pa. to Amy ( Shrift ) Asztalos a restaurant service industry professional, Gyula Asztalos Jr., an auto technician turned auto instructor. His ancestry includes mostly Hungarian, German and Irish. Owen basically came out of the womb dancing and singing like Elvis Presley and by the age of two was a die hard Elvis fan/follower/impersonator. From the time he was born he was always involved in some kind of story time, Kinder Music, theater classes, acting camps etc..In 2014 one of Owens theater teachers asked Owen to perform as a young Beethoven in Beethoven Revealed for a local theater company. After his spectacular performance in Beethoven Revealed, the family was tipped off about a new local management company neighboring West Reading Pa.. The rest is history as they say. They took on Owen as his managers in January 2015 followed by being signed by a New York agency. Since then Owen has been on fire in NYC!
